description: 「持続可能な物流インフラを創る」をビジョンにクラウド物流管理ソリューション「MOVO」シリーズを展開。トラック予約受付「MOVO Berth」は5年連続シェアNo.1で利用事業所3万2000超・登録ドライバー60万人突破。物流2024年問題対策として荷待ち・荷役時間の削減を支援。LIXIL・YKK AP・日本製紙・キリンなど大手企業が導入。累計資金調達56億円で設立10周年を迎える。
description_en: Offers cloud logistics management solution "MOVO" series with vision "Creating sustainable logistics infrastructure." Truck reservation service "MOVO Berth" holds #1 share for 5 consecutive years with over 32,000 business locations and 600,000 registered drivers. Supports reduction of waiting and loading/unloading time to address 2024 logistics problem. Adopted by major companies including LIXIL, YKK AP, Nippon Paper, and Kirin. Raised 5.6 billion yen cumulatively, celebrating 10th anniversary.
